00018 #ifndef __VOTCA_KMC_VSSMGROUP_H_
00019 #define __VOTCA_KMC_VSSMGROUP_H_
00020 
00021 #include <votca/tools/random.h>
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 
00025 namespace votca { namespace kmc {
00026 
00027 using namespace votca::tools;
00028 
00029 /***
00030  * \brief groups events based on variable step size method
00031  *
00032  * This class groups the events based on the variable step size method. The waiting time is calculated
00033  * from the total rate. The probability to choose an event is P_i = \omega_i / \omega_tot
00034  *
00035  * The template argument is a class which has to implement the functions Rate, which should return the rate of the event
00036  * and onExecute, which is called if the event occurs. VSSMGroup implements these methods it's own and therefore
00037  * can be used as an event itself. This allows hierarchical grouping of events.
00038  *
00039  * \todo add a refresh function if rates have changed
00040  */
00041 template<typename event_t>
00042 class VSSMGroup {
00043 public:
00044         VSSMGroup() {
00045                 _acc_rate.push_back(0);
00046         }
00047 
00048         /***
00049          * \brief add event to list of possible events
00050          */
00051         void AddEvent(event_t *event) {
00052                 _events.push_back(event);
00053                 _acc_rate.push_back(_acc_rate.back() + event->Rate());
00054                 UpdateWaitingTime();
00055         }
00056 
00060         double Rate() { return _acc_rate.back(); };
00061 
00065         void onExecute();
00069         double WaitingTime() { return _waiting_time; }
00070 
00074         void UpdateWaitingTime() {
00075                 _waiting_time = -log( 1.0 - Random::rand_uniform() ) / Rate();
00076         }
00077 
00078         event_t *getEvent(int i) { return _events[i]; }
00079 
00080 protected:
00084         event_t *SelectEvent_LinearSearch();
00085 
00089         event_t *SelectEvent_BinarySearch();
00090 
00091         std::vector<event_t*> _events;
00092         std::vector<double> _acc_rate;
00093         double _waiting_time;
00094 };
00095 
00096 template<typename event_t>
00097 inline void VSSMGroup<event_t>::onExecute()
00098 {
00099         SelectEvent_BinarySearch()->onExecute();
00100         UpdateWaitingTime();
00101 }
00102 
00103 template<typename event_t>
00104 inline event_t *VSSMGroup<event_t>::SelectEvent_LinearSearch()
00105 {
00106         double u = (1.-Random::rand_uniform())*Rate();
00107         event_t *event;
00108         // find the biggest event for that u < \sum omega_i
00109         for(typename std::vector<event_t*>::iterator e=_events.begin();
00110                         e!=_events.end(); ++e) {
00111                         u-=(*e)->Rate();
00112                         if(u<=0) return *e;
00113         }
00114         // should never happen
00115         return _events.back();
00116 }
00117 
00118 template<typename event_t>
00119 event_t *VSSMGroup<event_t>::SelectEvent_BinarySearch()
00120 {
00121         double u = 1.-Random::rand_uniform();
00122         u=u*Rate();
00123         double max = Rate();
00124         // to a binary search in accumulated events
00125         int imin=0;
00126         int imax=_acc_rate.size();
00127 
00128         while(imax - imin > 1) {
00129                 int imid=(int)((imin+imax)*0.5);
00130                 //std::cout << u << " " << _acc_rate[imid] << std::endl;
00131                 if(u<=_acc_rate[imid])
00132                         imax=imid;
00133                 else
00134                         imin=imid;
00135         }
00136    // std::cout << imin << " " << Rate() <<" " << u << std::endl;
00137         return _events[imin];
00138 }
00139 
00140 }}
00141 
00142 #endif
